original_text: Now when they were going, behold, some of the watch came into the city, and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done.
korean_text: 여자들이 갈 때 경비병 중 몇이 성에 들어가 모든 된 일을 대제사장들에게 알리니

sentences.original_text: some of the watch came into the city,
sentences.korean_translation: 경비원 중 어떤 이들이 성 안에 들어와서

sentences.original_text: and shewed unto the chief priests
all the things that were done.
